ch0139_40_sana/0101_0701_02_10:
Just kidding! I hope I find a mystery worth
solving today!
ch0139_40_sana/7102_0701_01_10:
Did you know? Klefki loves keys and is always
collecting them.
ch0139_40_sana/7102_0701_02_10:
But apparently, Klefki doesn’t like just any key—
only master keys.
ch0139_40_sana/7102_0701_03_10:
I suppose when you really like something, you get
a bit particular about it! ♪
ch0139_40_sana/7103_0701_01_10:
What should I do if I’m on a case and the culprit
is one of my friends?
ch0139_40_sana/7103_0701_02_10:
A detective must always give it their all, even
when the job’s tough...
ch0139_40_sana/7103_0701_03_10: I’m joking! I’m sure that’ll never happen!
ch0139_40_sana/7104_0701_01_10:
Hehehe, I bought a new puzzle, and I hear it’s
a hard one! ♪
ch0139_40_sana/7104_0701_02_10: It may take me a while to solve.
ch0139_40_sana/7104_0701_03_10:
But the time spent trying to solve it makes me
happy, too, so it might be more fun if I can’t! ♪
ch0139_40_sana/7105_0701_01_10: I love the moment I unlock a mystery.
ch0139_40_sana/7105_0701_02_10:
It’s like a fog of uncertainty fades away, and a
light shines through.
ch0139_40_sana/7105_0701_03_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Want to help me
look for unsolved mysteries on Pasio?
ch0139_40_sana/1701_0701_01_10: This is a present from me! ♪
ch0139_40_sana/1701_0702_01_10: I know it’ll come in handy! ♪
ch0139_40_sana/2501_0701_01_10:
Do you know Emma from the detective agency in
Lumiose City?
ch0139_40_sana/2501_0701_02_10:
I want to hear some of her stories and learn what
a real detective does.
ch0139_40_sana/2501_0702_01_10: Emma works for all the people in the city.
ch0139_40_sana/2501_0702_02_10: And living in peace makes everyone happy!
ch0139_40_sana/2501_0702_03_10: So I’d love to help her out!
ch0139_40_sana/2511_0701_01_10: I once owned a device that could solve puzzles.
ch0139_40_sana/2511_0701_02_10:
I ended up needing it, but I was only able to use
it the one time.
ch0139_40_sana/2511_0701_03_10: I don’t want to have to do that again...
ch0139_40_sana/2511_0701_04_10: I like solving puzzles at my own pace.
ch0139_40_sana/2511_0702_01_10:
It can get frustrating when things don’t go the
way you want...
ch0139_40_sana/2511_0702_02_10: But that’s what makes finishing them so satisfying!
ch0139_40_sana/2511_0702_03_10:
No one likes a puzzle they already know how
to solve.
ch0139_40_sana/3001_0701_01_10:
MORNING! I’m starting the day at full volume!
Just my way of sharing my energy!
ch0139_40_sana/3003_0701_01_10:
As always, there’s no time for dawdling today!
We’ve gotta get out there and make
more memories!
ch0139_40_sana/3005_0701_01_10:
Oof, I’m getting really sleepy... Guess it’s time for
me and my Pokémon to head off to the world
of dreams.
